news_header: Fresh Servant is expanding its operations in Seinäjoki and increasing salad production in Pedersöre.
news_original_title: Valmissalaattifirma Fresh Servant keskittää tukkukaupan Seinäjoelle ja hakee tuotannon kasvua Pedersöreen
news_text: Fresh Servant is hiring more employees in Seinäjoki while transferring its wholesale activities there, which will allow for increased salad production in Pedersöre. The company plans to move its wholesale trade to Seinäjoki, which will include a vegetable packing plant and storage facilities. This change, expected to occur before summer, will create ten new jobs in Seinäjoki but will also result in a reduction of ten positions in Pedersöre. Fresh Servant aims for a 10% increase in production and is investing over EUR 4 million in the transition. The company currently employs 550 people, with 440 in Pedersöre and 50 in Lapua, where it produces ready-made sandwiches and snacks.
